titleStmt.title: Field by field register of land at Kerkeosiris

msContents.summary: Two columns of a field-by-field register of land at Kerkeosiris, giving for each plot the geographical relationship to other plots, the name of the landholder and his patronymic, the fiscal category to which the plot belongs, the area, the measurement, and the rent paid to the crown per aroura if any.

msItemStruct.note: Margins: top, 0.9 cm.; bottom, 1 cm.; right, 7.5 cm.

Adjacent on the north, forming a western boundary of the next lot, receding 1/8 1/16 schoinion west of the unsurveyed land, a further parcel measuring 1 1/2 1/8 x 1/2 1/4 1/8 1/16 x 1 1/8 1/16 1/32 x 1 1/4 1/8 1/16, total 1 1/2 1/8 1/16 1/64, grand total 6 1/32 arouras, 1 1/2 in excess (of the proper 4 1/2). Adjacent on the east, projecting 2 1/4 1/8 /132 schoinia south of the previously surveyed property, 2 arouras of salt land which has been declared derelict since year 40 (of Ptolemy VIII Euergetes II), measuring 1/4 1/8 x 1/4 x 3 1/2 1/8 x 3 1/2 1/8, total 1 1/8 1/32 arouras salt land. Adjacent on the north, projecting 1/2 1/4 1/8 1/16 schoinion west of the property previously surveyed, the remainder of the derelict land, measuring 1 1/8 1/16 x 1 x 1 1/8 1/16 x 1 1/2, total 1 1/2 1/8 1/32. Adjacent on the north, receding 1/2 1/4 1/8 1/16 schoinion east of the fields about Tali, the remainder, measuring 1/8 x 1/8 x 2 1/8 x 2 1/8, total 4 1/64. Total derelict, 3 1/16 arouras.
